# Configure BMad for New Greenfield Project

## Purpose
Set up a complete BMad environment for a new project from scratch. Creates all required directories, config files, and baseline workflows.

## When to Use
Starting a brand new project with BMad from day one.

## Related Agent
`@setup-bmad-master`

## What This Does
- Creates complete `_bmad/` structure from templates
- Initializes all module configs (core, bmm, bmb, cis)
- Sets up base workflows for analysis, planning, solutioning, implementation
- Configures user preferences
- Creates starter project documentation

## Expected Outcome
Greenfield project with full BMad methodology ready for use.
